learning_goals: Design one or more web-based science education contents using strategies for each stage of the PINTARR model.

Learners can compare and evaluate three web tools (Google Analytics, SurveyMonkey, Moodle, etc.) based on provided student analysis data (demographics, learning tendencies, technical proficiency), and create a priority-based implementation plan in three stages (introduction, execution, evaluation) aligned with the analysis results.
Revise and improve digital educational materials two or more times reflecting formative assessment feedback.
